net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.dialog

Interface PopupDialog

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractDialog, AttributeReadId<String>, AttributeReadTitle<String>, AttributeReadVisible

    public interface PopupDialog
extends AbstractDialog
    This is the interface for a PopupDialog that displays itself on top of a Dialog. It can be closed and typically be moved around or resized by the end-user.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.dialog.AbstractDialog

        PATTERN_DIALOG_ID

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.dialog.AbstractDialog

        getId, getTitle, isVisible
